description.value:
An Oathbreaker paladin loses previously gained oath spells and instead gains the following Oathbreaker spells at the paladin levels listed.

Oathbreaker Spells
Paladin LevelSpells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHellishReb]{Hellish Rebuke}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplInflictWou]{Inflict Wounds}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCrownOfMad]{Crown of Madness}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.sApWByvBq5cL3ZoG]{Darkness}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.3YszGKeKcRAu6KqE]{Animate Dead}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.3KxFNkM8udakT18n]{Bestow Curse}
13th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.zQDppbmxyBQZnWKL]{Blight}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.IVSsvCN7diHIuseG]{Confusion}
17th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.4FaXMyU2b5DXqnFv]{Contagion}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.PeibHLKvQlxn5FdG]{Dominate Person}
